name: EvilMan vs Hell Lava
description:
Intro
This game was made in under 3 hours (About 2:58) for Trijam. The theme was "Evil vs Evil" and I really struggled to think of something, I ended up settling on a bad man trying to survive in hell.

How to play?
Run and jump to avoid the lava wall, also don't fall (Or do the player is evil).

  • A/D or Arrows to run
  • Space to jump
  • Double and triple jump by pushing Space in mid air

Assets

  • All the art was done during the 3 hours
  • The music is procedurally generated using Wolfram Tones
  • The jump sfx was generated using bfxr
